pages.title: Runic Artifact
pages.text: Once you have completed your first Catalyst, it's time to construct the device that will generate resources for you. The Runic Artifact is a powerful and mysterious machine, eight levitating spheres of obsidian covered in magically glowing runes, capable of collecting the mana in the air and giving it a physical form.
Different Catalyst will yield different products, however the time it takes to complete the process remains the same. Consult your Compendium to learn what each Catalyst can produce.
